data.title: 4344 Boyd Avenue, BRONX
data.meta_description: 4344 Boyd Avenue, BRONX - Asking $685000 - Closed. Features, Community Information, Amenities, School Information, Maps, and Request a Showing.
data.text:
About 4344 Boyd Avenue

Detached Charming Meticulously Maintained Single Family home with a beautiful sunroom in the Wakefield section of the Bronx. Home has a few renovations such as new kitchen, new pantry with door to the back patio/yard and hardwood floors. Remodeled walkways and entrance. Home is immaculate featuring 3 bedrooms, 1.5 baths, Open layout Livingroom, Dining room and beautiful eat in kitchen. Family room in the second floor. Finished attic with 2 bedroom addition and updated finished walk out basement made into a very relaxing and welcoming family room or extra bedroom.
